content: lion brand pattern # chs-throw skill level intermediate level 3 homespun® article #790 7 balls *shown in shaker* crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm pattern incorporates loop stitch using finger to lengthen yarn to make shag texture see photo tutorial provided *loop stitch lp st is a variation of single_crochet single_crochet and is worked on the wrong-side row because the loops form at the back of the fabric * use a 5 x 5 strip of cardboard for the border fringe sew a loop fringe edging to top and bottom of throw to finish *because of the texture of homespun the fringe will fray when cut if you prefer a non-frayed look you can knot the ends knit or crochet a fringe or use hairspray or fray checktm by dritz® *
